info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 11:13PM MDT until June 29 at 12:30AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Liberty County in north central Montana... Northwestern Blaine County in north central Montana... Hill County in north central Montana... * Until 1230 AM MDT. * At 1112 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gildford, or 27 miles west of Havre, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Havre, Chinook, Joplin, Beaver Creek, Inverness, Gildford, Hingham, Rudyard, Lohman, Kremlin, Laredo and Simpson. This includes locations along Highway 2 from Inverness to Chinook. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing widespread wind gusts in excess of 60 mph. Seek shelter now inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
